items.title: Debunking Cloud Seeding Conspiracy Theories
items.author: Justine Calma
items.summary:
- **Cloud seeding** does not cause storms or increase atmospheric moisture; it only enhances existing precipitation. 
- Social media and political figures have dangerously misattributed flash floods to cloud seeding, leading to threats against companies like Rainmaker. 
- **Climate change** is the real culprit behind increased rainfall intensity, complicating disaster response and prevention.

items.title: AG Investigates AI Chatbots' Rankings of Trump
items.author: Adi Robertson
items.summary:
- Missouri Attorney General Andrew Bailey is probing Google, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Meta for allegedly misleading rankings of Donald Trump by their AI chatbots.  
- The investigation claims these chatbots provided “factually inaccurate” responses while Bailey demands extensive documentation on their training practices.  
- Critics highlight the absurdity of the claim, noting that ranking presidents is subjective and pointing to possible legal overreach regarding tech companies.
